name: DRTS Game
description:
Scout your enemies, spot and exploit their weakness to win the game.

This game focuses on the core of real time strategy, forgoing resource gathering, base building and unit types.

The simplicity and comprehensive tutorial make it easy to jump into within minutes.

Both multiplayer and singleplayer mode are already implemented, the game is work in progress though and updates will follow.

Controls:
Camera panning: Hold down a mouse button and drag to move the camera.
Camera Zoom: Use the mouse wheel or plus and minus keys on the keyboard to zoom.
All other controls are explained in the interactive tutorial.
